ca.corefacility.gview.utils.content

Class ContentCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.utils.content.ContentCalculator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AverageCalculator, SkewCalculator

    public abstract class ContentCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the content frequencies of symbols within the sequence.
    Author:
    aaron

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContentCalculator

        public ContentCalculator(GenomeData genomeData,
                 boolean circular,
                 int stepSize,
                 int windowSize)
        Creates a new ContentCalculator around the passed genomic data, with the passed properties.
        Parameters:
        genomeData - The data to calculate averages for.
        circular - Whether or not the genomeData represents a circular genome.
        stepSize - The step size for the average calculations.
        windowSize - The window size for the average calculations.

        public abstract java.util.Iterator<ContentCalculator.RangeValue> contentIterator()
        Creates an iterator to iterate over the content and do the appropriate calculations.
        Returns:
        A RangeValue which contains a range location on the sequence, and the value for this range.
